Description.Text: Full service hotel located in the heart of the city's business district and within walking distance of most cultural, historical, and family oriented attractions including Rittenhouse Square, Antique Row and the Academy of Natural Sciences. Adjacent to Liberty Place with over 70 unique boutiques and restaurants and easily accessible to the Convention Center, 30th Street Train Station, and major universities. Free high-speed Internet access in all guest rooms, 24 hour Guest Service Desk/Concierge, Fitness Facility, Private Club Room with complimentary newspapers, magazine and games, as well as use of a computer/printer with free high-speed Internet access. Guestrooms are comfortable, elegantly styled and beautifully appointed with all modern conveniences. Other amenities include two-line speakerphone with private direct dial phone number, well-lighted desk and work area. Its restaurant/bar, Davio's, is a famous northern Italian steakhouse. Room Service as well as multi-menu room delivery also available. Club Quarters warm and friendly staff provides first class customer service. The hotel is minutes to fine dining, shopping and entertainment. Club Quarters is affiliated with Parkway Garage at 16th and Chestnut, cost is $21 per 24-hour period. Sorry no in/out privileges.

Academy of Natural Sciences, Rittenhouse Square, Franklin Institute, Antique Row, Liberty Place shops and restaurants, Philadelphia Convention Center, City Hall, Kimmel Center for Performing Arts, Historic and Waterfront District, Washington Square District, Jewelers Row, Theater District, Restaurant Row, Chinatown.

Superior with Kitchenette - Oversized room with one queen bed and kitchenette, including microwave and refrigerator. Other features include premium bedding and linens, contemporary furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, flat screen LCD TV with cable/satellite, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, MP3 alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a rollaway - available only upon request and subject to availability. Maximum Occupancy: 3
Standard Room - One queen bed with premium bedding and linens.Other features include contemporary furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, flat screen LCD TV with cable/satellite, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, MP3 alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Maximum Occupancy: 2

Maximum Occupancy: 2
1 Room Suite with Kitchenette - One queen bed with sofa and kitchenette, including microwave and refrigerator. Other features include premium bedding and linens, contemporary furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, flat screen LCD TV with cable/satellite, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, MP3 alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a rollaway - available only upon request and subject to availability. Maximum Occupancy: 3
